description:
Although Barbie's slim but pneumatic figure has hardly changed since the doll first landed on shelves in 1959, it's a completely different story when it comes to her face.尽管芭比娃娃纤细的充气身材自1959年第一次上架以来几乎没有什么改变，但她的脸完全变样了。

When Barbie first arrived on the scene, created by Ruth Handler and marketed by Mattel, she was inspired by a doll which already existed in Germany. 芭比娃娃由露丝·汉德勒创立，美泰公司进行销售，第一个芭比娃娃的灵感是来源于当时在德国已经存在的一个娃娃。

Barbie had heavy lids and pursed lips but as the Sixties came, her lips became rounder and her makeup softened.芭比娃娃有着厚厚的眼睑、翘撅的嘴唇，但是到六十年代时她的嘴唇变得更加圆润，妆容也变得更加柔和。

While in the Seventies, her eyes became notably larger and she adopted a Scandinavian style with much lighter blonde hair, in the images collated by blogger Tenaflyviper.到七十年代时，她的眼睛明显变大，在网友Tenaflyviper收集的对比照中，芭比娃娃有着斯堪的纳维亚式的浅色金发。

Barbie's eyes became bluer, as did her eyeshadow in the Eighties, even wearing blue mascara, and her forehead appears to become higher in this era also.八十年代，芭比娃娃的眼睛变得更蓝了，眼影也是，甚至还用了蓝色的睫毛膏。在这期间她的前额也貌似变得更加凸出了。
While a Barbie from 1990 sported a short shaggy bob and fringe, by the end of the Nineties she sported long hair and came with accessories so children could curl or twist it into a new look.而1990年，芭比的头发变成了短款蓬松的波波头自带刘海，90年代末，她又变成长发了，还配有装饰物，那样小孩子们就可以把她的头发弄卷或造一个新发型。
Her previously full cheeks give way to a sleeker look, which could reflect the raise of the waif in the late Nineties with thinner models like Kate Moss all the rage, plus her nose became straighter.The decade also saw her back in her tan-obsessed phase, while the 2015 doll is much paler.她先前那圆嘟嘟的脸颊也变得更精致，反映出90年代晚期当时的流行趋向：当时像凯特·摩丝那样的超瘦模特非常受欢迎。另外她的鼻子也变得更笔挺。此后的十年间，芭比娃娃又变回了黝黑肤色的阶段，但2015年的芭比娃娃则更白些。
Peroxide blond Barbie also appears to be no more, with the doll wearing a more flattering shade of warm tones and by 2015 Barbie looks more realistic in natural makeup.头发漂染的成金色芭比娃娃貌似也没什么更大的变化，整体色调变得更加自然温和，到了2015年芭比娃娃自然的妆容让她看起来更加真实。
